workshoptitle: OpenTracing for microservices with React, Helidon and ATP using APM

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create APM Domain and obtain Data Upload Endpoint and Data Keys
tutorials.description: Create APM Domain and obtain Data Upload Endpoint and Data Keys

tutorials.title: Lab 2: SConfigure APM Tracer for Maven, Helidon, Browser, and custom spans
tutorials.description: Configure APM Tracer for Maven, Helidon, Browser, and custom spans

tutorials.title: Lab 3: View traces and spans in APM Trace Explorer
tutorials.description: View traces and spans in APM Trace Explorer

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
